column2: "...You come here too?"
"I could ask you the same."
"Every now and then... yeah."
"...I do, occasionally."
"I see you do as well."

"Even now, I still can't
believe what happened here."

"And you... It happened just
as you arrived on Halpha."

"Aelio Town was...
a wonderful village."

"Everyone was so warm,
so welcoming..."

"When I arrived on Halpha, the door to my pod
malfunctioned and I was unable to get out of it."

"And then who comes to my
rescue but the ARKS of Aelio Town."
"They gathered so many people<brto help open the door to my pod."

"Afterwards, it was much like what you experienced.
Everyone welcomed me with such open arms."

"They looked so happy to see me.
Like they had all just found a new friend."

"And then, they couldn't wait to tell me
all about this world I found myself on."

"Everyone was so strong, too. Even medium-sized
DOLLS were hardly a match for any of them."

"Garoa was in a league of his own. He would
take down so many giant DOLLS all by himself."

"With just one swing of
that massive weapon of his."

"So for something like that...
...to happen to..."
"...I know."
"All we can do is fight on."

"...I'm sorry. Of course...
You were there that day too."

"...Yes. Yes, you're right.
All we can do... is fight on."

"I'm sorry... I don't mean to
give you cause for worry."

"I try not to wear my heart on my sleeve in front of
other people, but it looks like it's no use in front of you..."

"...I'd like to have a moment
to myself, if you don't mind."

"I'll head back to Central City
once I've composed myself."
